name: Apptility Software
tag_list: ipad, socialcrm, crm, mobile, android, iphone, iad, content, game, educational, book, apps
overview:
Apptility is a privately held San Jose-based software development company. Apptility offers services and products to accelerate the adoption of social computing solutions. Services range from conceptualization to community design to custom application development.

Apptility develops mobile apps on leading platforms like iOS, iPad, Android, OpenSocial, Facebook, Twitter and Amazon Cloud Services. Apptility offices are located at leading technology hubs of the world - San Jose, California and Bangalore, India.

Products:

Content application for iPad http://www.fliplog.com Social recruiting and college marketing solutions http://www.codemunch.com http://www.socialcrm.com http://www.ajuby.com
